Episodes.Title: The Thin White Line

Episodes.Writer: Seth MacFarlane, David Zuckerman, Steve Callaghan
Episodes.Actors: Seth MacFarlane, Alex Borstein, Seth Green
Episodes.Plot: Brian becomes a drug-sniffing dog for police to get out of a rut after taking the advice of his therapist, but the cocaine may be more than he can handle.

Episodes.Title: Brian Does Hollywood
Episodes.Director: Gavin Dell, Pete Michels, Peter Shin
Episodes.Writer: Seth MacFarlane, David Zuckerman, Gary Janetti
Episodes.Actors: Seth MacFarlane, Alex Borstein, Seth Green
Episodes.Plot: When Brian leaves the family for Hollywood with dreams of becoming a screenwriter and director, he winds up directing a porn video.

Episodes.Title: Mr. Griffin Goes to Washington

Episodes.Writer: Seth MacFarlane, David Zuckerman, Ricky Blitt
Episodes.Actors: Seth MacFarlane, Alex Borstein, Seth Green
Episodes.Plot: After the toy company is taken over by a tobacco company, Peter is set up as the president and is sent to Washington to lobby against a bill.

Episodes.Title: One If by Clam, Two If by Sea
Episodes.Director: Dan Povenmire, Pete Michels, Peter Shin
Episodes.Writer: Seth MacFarlane, David Zuckerman, Jim Bernstein
Episodes.Actors: Seth MacFarlane, Alex Borstein, Seth Green
Episodes.Plot: When a hurricane destroys The Drunken Clam, it is bought by a British man who turns it into an English pub to the dismay of Peter and the gang.

Episodes.Title: And the Wiener Is...
Episodes.Director: Bert Ring, Pete Michels, Peter Shin
Episodes.Writer: Seth MacFarlane, David Zuckerman, Mike Barker
Episodes.Actors: Seth MacFarlane, Alex Borstein, Seth Green
Episodes.Plot: Peter becomes jealous of Chris' very large endowment.

Episodes.Title: Death Lives
Episodes.Writer: Seth MacFarlane, David Zuckerman, Mike Henry
Episodes.Actors: Seth MacFarlane, Alex Borstein, Seth Green
Episodes.Plot: Peter dies again, and Death shows him the errors of his ways.

Episodes.Title: Lethal Weapons
Episodes.Writer: Seth MacFarlane, David Zuckerman, Chris Sheridan
Episodes.Actors: Seth MacFarlane, Alex Borstein, Seth Green
Episodes.Plot: Lois takes Tae-Jitsu, quickly becomes a black-belt and scares away all of the frustrating New Yorkers that had come to Quahog to view the leaves.

Episodes.Title: The Kiss Seen Round the World
Episodes.Writer: Seth MacFarlane, David Zuckerman, Mark Hentemann
Episodes.Actors: Seth MacFarlane, Alex Borstein, Seth Green
Episodes.Plot: Meg takes an internship to work for Tom with Neil as her partner and kisses him during a life-threading situation that is caught on tape.

Episodes.Title: Mr. Saturday Knight
Episodes.Director: Michael Dante DiMartino, Pete Michels, Peter Shin
Episodes.Writer: Seth MacFarlane, David Zuckerman, Steve Callaghan
Episodes.Actors: Seth MacFarlane, Alex Borstein, Seth Green
Episodes.Plot: Losing his job at the toy factory is he least of his concerns, when Peter is caught monkeying around with a renaissance fair wench.

Episodes.Title: A Fish Out of Water
Episodes.Director: Bert Ring, Pete Michels, Peter Shin
Episodes.Writer: Seth MacFarlane, David Zuckerman, Alex Borstein
Episodes.Actors: Seth MacFarlane, Alex Borstein, Seth Green
Episodes.Plot: Peter tries to pay of the debts he accrued while pursuing his dream of owning a commercial fishing boat by catching an infamous, man-eating fish.

Episodes.Title: Emission Impossible
Episodes.Writer: Seth MacFarlane, David Zuckerman, Dave Collard
Episodes.Actors: Seth MacFarlane, Alex Borstein, Seth Green
Episodes.Plot: After Peter helps deliver Lois's sister's baby, he and Lois decide to try to have another kid, but Stewie will attempt to foil their new plan.

Episodes.Title: To Love and Die in Dixie
Episodes.Writer: Seth MacFarlane, David Zuckerman, Steve Callaghan
Episodes.Actors: Seth MacFarlane, Alex Borstein, Seth Green
Episodes.Plot: After Chris witnesses a convenience store robbery, the Griffins are put in the witness protection program and relocated to the Deep South.

Episodes.Title: Screwed the Pooch
Episodes.Writer: Seth MacFarlane, David Zuckerman, Dave Collard
Episodes.Actors: Seth MacFarlane, Alex Borstein, Seth Green
Episodes.Plot: Brian confesses to Peter and Lois that he has had sexual yearnings lately, so Lois suggests that Brian join them for a change of scenery.

Episodes.Title: Peter Griffin: Husband, Father... Brother?
Episodes.Writer: Seth MacFarlane, David Zuckerman, Mike Barker
Episodes.Actors: Seth MacFarlane, Alex Borstein, Seth Green
Episodes.Plot: While learning about his family history, Chris discovers that one of Peter's ancestors was a black slave once owned by the Pewterschmidts.

Episodes.Title: Ready, Willing and Disabled
Episodes.Writer: Seth MacFarlane, David Zuckerman, Alex Barnow
Episodes.Actors: Seth MacFarlane, Alex Borstein, Seth Green
Episodes.Plot: Joe becomes a media darling after Peter spikes his sports drink with steroids during a track and field event for the disabled; the kids bicker over $26 they found.

Episodes.Title: A Very Special Family Guy Freakin' Christmas
Episodes.Writer: Seth MacFarlane, David Zuckerman, Danny Smith
Episodes.Actors: Seth MacFarlane, Alex Borstein, Seth Green
Episodes.Plot: Holiday mishaps include Lois going ballistic after losing her Christmas cheer and Peter not being able to watch the KISS Christmas special.

Episodes.Title: Brian Wallows and Peter's Swallows
Episodes.Writer: Seth MacFarlane, David Zuckerman, Ali Adler
Episodes.Actors: Seth MacFarlane, Alex Borstein, Seth Green
Episodes.Plot: Brian is sentenced to community service following a drunk driving episode; Peter cares for three endangered nestlings living in his freshly-grown beard.

Episodes.Title: From Method to Madness
Episodes.Writer: Seth MacFarlane, David Zuckerman, Mike Barker
Episodes.Actors: Seth MacFarlane, Alex Borstein, Seth Green
Episodes.Plot: When Brian shows interest in theatre, Lois convinces him to try out for School of Performing Arts, but during the audition, Brian is dismissed by the judges.

Episodes.Title: Stuck Together, Torn Apart
Episodes.Writer: Seth MacFarlane, David Zuckerman, Mark Hentemann
Episodes.Actors: Seth MacFarlane, Alex Borstein, Seth Green
Episodes.Plot: Peter's jealously reaches its peak when Lois runs into an old boyfriend, so Lois recommends marriage counseling to fix their relationship.

Episodes.Title: Road to Europe
Episodes.Writer: Seth MacFarlane, David Zuckerman, Daniel Palladino
Episodes.Actors: Seth MacFarlane, Alex Borstein, Seth Green
Episodes.Plot: Stewie and Brian go on a Pan-European journey back home after becoming stranded in Saudi Arabia; Peter is aghast to learn Lois is not really a fan of KISS.

Episodes.Title: Family Guy Viewer Mail #1
Episodes.Director: Michael Dante DiMartino, Pete Michels, Scott Wood
Episodes.Writer: Seth MacFarlane, David Zuckerman, Gene Laufenberg
Episodes.Actors: Seth MacFarlane, Alex Borstein, Seth Green
Episodes.Plot: Peter gets three wishes by a genie; The Griffins get superpowers; Quahog turns into the Little Rascals.

Episodes.Title: When You Wish Upon a Weinstein
Episodes.Writer: Seth MacFarlane, David Zuckerman, Ricky Blitt
Episodes.Actors: Seth MacFarlane, Alex Borstein, Seth Green
Episodes.Plot: Driven by his tilted views on Judaism, Peter goes from finding a Jewish accountant to throwing Chris a Bar Mitzvah to make him smart. Meanwhile, a group of angry Catholics are trying to hunt down Peter.
